data.text: So you loved the first of the Merry men one, the follow up is here.

These four men-- Falz the<mark class="cdx-marker" style="background-color: rgb(128, 64, 64); padding: 3px; margin: 2px; border-radius: 3px; color: white;"> Bad Guy as Remi Martins, A.Y </mark>as Amaju Abioritsegbemi, Ramsey Noah as Ayo Alesinloye and Jim Iyke as Naz Okigbo are here again to break hearts and cause trouble. They are the famed Yoruba demons.

The sequel to the<mark class="cdx-marker" style="background-color: rgb(0, 255, 0); padding: 3px; margin: 2px; border-radius: 3px; color: black;"> 2018</mark> movie has just dropped. The esemble movie has so many lovely actors in the cast including the likes of Regina Daniels, Ufoma McDermott, Alex Unusual, William Uchemba, Rosy Meurer, Iretiola Doyle, Linda Osifo, Nancy Isime and a host of others.
In MERRYMEN two, War is coming in this part.

William Uchemba though.<mark class="cdx-marker" style="background-color: rgb(255, 128, 128); padding: 3px; margin: 2px; border-radius: 3px; color: black;"> That guy needs spiritual aid. The movie is action packed</mark> and set to thrill viewers this December. Watch your side.
Check out the thriller on youtube-
